o.n.o..translation[0].definitions[0].def: used in advertisements to show that you are willing to sell something for slightly less money than you have said in the advertisement
o.n.o..translation[1].definitions[0].def: written abbreviation for OR NEAREST OFFER, used in advertisements to show that you may be willing to sell something for slightly less money than the actual amount stated
o.n.o..translation[1].definitions[0].exa: PC with 40Gb hard drive for sale: £200 ono.
